caption: Fra Angelico’s Annunciation (mid-1430s)
description: Fra Angelico's fresco depicts the Angel Gabriel announcing to the Virgin Mary that she will bear the Son of God.
subject: The Annunciation of the Virgin Mary
title: Annunciation

caption: Rembrandt's The Visitation
description: Rembrandt's painting shows the Virgin Mary visiting her cousin Elizabeth, both expecting miraculous children.
subject: Mary visiting Elizabeth
title: The Visitation

caption: Giovanni Antonio Pellegrini's The Nativity
description: Pellegrini's Nativity depicts the newborn Jesus with Mary and Joseph surrounded by angels and shepherds.
subject: The birth of Jesus Christ
title: The Nativity

caption: Fresco of Presentation in the Temple in Chiesa di Santa Rita by Giulio Campi (1547)
description: Campi's fresco illustrates the Presentation of Jesus at the Temple, fulfilling Jewish law and prophecy.
location: Chiesa di Santa Rita, Cremona, Italy
subject: Presentation of Jesus at the Temple
title: Presentation in the Temple

caption: Finding of Jesus in the Temple mosaic from Lourdes Basilica, France
description: This mosaic depicts the young Jesus debating with rabbis in the Temple, found by his worried parents.
subject: Jesus found teaching in the Temple
title: Finding of Jesus in the Temple

caption: An unknown artist’s fresco, Baptism of Christ, in Padua’s church of San Benedetto
description: This fresco shows John the Baptist baptizing Jesus in the Jordan River, with the Holy Spirit descending.
location: Church of San Benedetto, Padua, Italy
mystery_name: The Baptism of Jesus in the Jordan
subject: Baptism of Jesus by John the Baptist
title: Baptism of Christ

caption: Carl Bloch’s The Wedding at Cana
description: Bloch's painting captures Jesus turning water into wine at a wedding feast in Cana.
subject: Jesus performing his first miracle
title: The Wedding at Cana

caption: James Tissot’s Healing of the Lepers at Capernaum
description: Tissot portrays Jesus compassionately healing lepers, showcasing His divine power and mercy.
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
subject: Jesus healing lepers
title: Healing of the Lepers at Capernaum

caption: Transfiguration in Vienna’s Votive Church
description: This artwork depicts Jesus transfigured in divine light before Peter, James, and John.
subject: Transfiguration of Jesus
title: Transfiguration

caption: Giacomo Raffaelli (1753-1836) , an Italian mosaicist, created a life-sized mosaic copy of Leonardo da Vinci's The Last Supper
description: Raffaelli's mosaic reproduces Leonardo's Last Supper, showing Jesus announcing His betrayal.
subject: The Last Supper of Jesus with His apostles
title: The Last Supper (Mosaic)

caption: Agony in the Garden by Vicente Masip, also known as Vicente Juan Masip
description: Depicts Jesus praying in anguish while his disciples sleep, reflecting the Sorrowful Mystery.
subject: Jesus praying in Gethsemane
title: Agony in the Garden

caption: Giovanni Antonio Bazzi known as Sodoma, Christ at the Column (c. 1510-1515; detached fresco, 140 x 101 cm; Siena, Pinacoteca Nazionale)
description: Shows Christ tied to a column during his flagellation, illustrating the Sorrowful Mystery.
subject: Christ being scourged
title: Christ at the Column

caption: Titian’s Christ Crowned with Thorns (c. 1542–1543)
description: Depicts Christ suffering under the crown of thorns, a Sorrowful Mystery scene.
subject: Christ mocked and crowned with thorns
title: Christ Crowned with Thorns

caption: Pieter Bruegel the Elder’s The Procession to Calvary (1564)
description: A detailed depiction of Christ's journey to Calvary, reflecting the Sorrowful Mystery.
subject: Christ carrying the cross
title: The Procession to Calvary

caption: The fresco of Crucifixion in the church San Girolamo dei Croati by Pietro Gagliardi (1847-1852)
description: Depicts Christ's crucifixion, the central event of the Sorrowful Mysteries.
location: San Girolamo dei Croati, Rome, Italy
subject: Christ crucified
title: Crucifixion

caption: Resurrection (1593) by Annibale Carracci
description: Depicts Christ's triumphant resurrection, a key Glorious Mystery.
subject: Christ rising from the dead
title: Resurrection

caption: Crossing (Ascension) cupola 1175-1200 Mosaic Basilica di San Marco, Venice
description: Depicts Christ ascending into heaven, marking the Glorious Mystery.
location: Basilica di San Marco, Venice, Italy
subject: Christ ascending into heaven
title: Ascension Mosaic

caption: “Pentecost” by Jean Restout II (1692–1768)
description: Illustrates the descent of the Holy Spirit, a key Glorious Mystery.
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: Holy Spirit descending upon the apostles
title: Pentecost

caption: The Assumption of Virgin Mary in the main cupola in Chiesa di Santa Maria del Orto by Giuseppe and Andrea Orazi 1706
description: Depicts Mary's assumption, symbolizing the Glorious Mystery.
location: Chiesa di Santa Maria del Orto, Rome, Italy
subject: Mary's assumption into heaven
title: The Assumption of Virgin Mary

caption: Coronation of the Virgin, a painting on oil on canvas by Diego Velázquez of the Holy Trinity crowning the Blessed Virgin Mary, at the Museo del Prado
description: Depicts Mary's coronation in heaven, completing the Glorious Mysteries.
subject: Mary crowned by the Trinity
title: Coronation of the Virgin

caption: The Annunciation, an 1898 painting by African-American painter Henry Ossawa Tanner
description: Depicts the angel Gabriel announcing to Mary that she will conceive Jesus, with a focus on spiritual awe and humility.
subject: The Annunciation to the Virgin Mary
title: The Annunciation

caption: The painting of Visitation in the church Chiesa dei Santi Severino e Sossio by Federico Maldarelli (1889)
description: Depicts Mary visiting her cousin Elizabeth, both women rejoicing in their miraculous pregnancies.
location: Chiesa dei Santi Severino e Sossio, Naples, Italy
subject: The Visitation of Mary to Elizabeth
title: The Visitation

caption: Gerard van Honthorst - Adoration of the Shepherds (1622)
description: Shows shepherds gathered around the Baby Jesus in Bethlehem, emphasizing humble worship.
subject: Shepherds adoring the newborn Christ
title: Adoration of the Shepherds

caption: The painting of Presentation of Jesus in the Temple in church kostel Svatého Havla by unknown baroque artist
description: Depicts Mary and Joseph presenting the infant Jesus to Simeon in the Temple.
location: Church of St. Gall (kostel Svatého Havla), Prague
subject: Jesus presented in the Temple
title: Presentation of Jesus in the Temple

caption: Jesus, at 12, teaching in the Temple
description: Shows Jesus discussing theology with the elders while His parents search for Him.
subject: Twelve-year-old Jesus teaching in the Temple
title: Jesus Teaching in the Temple

artist: Leonardo Da Vinci (studio of Andrea del Verrochio)
caption: The Baptism of Christ by Leonardo Da Vinci created in the studio of Andrea del Verrochio around 1475
description: Depicts Jesus being baptized by John, with heavenly light and angels witnessing the event.
mystery_name: The Baptism of Jesus in the Jordan
subject: John the Baptist baptizing Jesus
title: The Baptism of Christ

caption: Gerard David's The Marriage at Cana
description: Jesus performs His first miracle at a wedding in Cana, transforming water into wine.
subject: The wedding feast where Jesus turns water into wine
title: The Marriage at Cana

caption: The Adulterous Woman by Lorenzo Lotto
description: Jesus prevents the stoning of an adulterous woman, teaching mercy over judgment.
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
subject: Christ pardoning the adulterous woman
title: The Adulterous Woman

caption: Raphael's The Transfiguration
description: Jesus shines in divine glory on Mount Tabor, witnessed by three apostles.
subject: Jesus transfigured before Peter, James, and John
title: The Transfiguration

caption: The Last Supper by Juan de Juanes
description: Jesus shares bread and wine with His disciples, establishing Holy Communion.
subject: Jesus instituting the Eucharist
title: The Last Supper

caption: The Prayer of Jesus in Gethsemane by Alessandro Maganza
description: A depiction of Jesus praying in agony in the Garden of Gethsemane before His arrest.
subject: Jesus praying in the Garden of Gethsemane
title: The Prayer of Jesus in Gethsemane

caption: The Flagellation of Christ: Painting by Caravaggio
description: A dramatic Baroque painting showing Jesus bound to a column and being whipped by His tormentors.
subject: Christ being scourged at the pillar
title: The Flagellation of Christ

caption: Caravaggio's Ecce Homo - Behold The Man
description: A powerful portrayal of Jesus crowned with thorns, presented by Pilate with the words 'Ecce Homo' (Behold the Man).
subject: Pilate presenting Christ to the crowd
title: Ecce Homo

caption: The Lost Caravaggio - Ecce Homo
description: Another interpretation of Ecce Homo, showing Christ after His crowning with thorns.
subject: Christ crowned with thorns
title: Ecce Homo

caption: Christ carrying the Cross (1605) by Orazio Gentileschi
description: A Baroque depiction of Jesus struggling under the weight of the cross on the way to His crucifixion.
subject: Jesus bearing the cross to Calvary
title: Christ Carrying the Cross

caption: James Tissot's What Our Lord Saw From The Cross
description: A unique perspective showing the scene as Christ would have seen it from the cross during His crucifixion.
original_title: Ce que voyait Notre-Seigneur sur la Croix
subject: The view from Christ's perspective on the cross
title: What Our Lord Saw from the Cross

caption: Caravaggio's The Incredulity of St. Thomas
description: A dramatic depiction of doubting Thomas touching Christ's wounds after the Resurrection.
subject: Thomas touching Christ's wounds
title: The Incredulity of Saint Thomas

caption: Ascension of the Lord by Bernardino Gandino
description: A depiction of Christ rising into heaven witnessed by His disciples after the Resurrection.
subject: Christ ascending into heaven
title: Ascension of the Lord

caption: Pentecost by Titian
description: A Renaissance masterpiece showing the Holy Spirit descending upon Mary and the Apostles at Pentecost.
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: The descent of the Holy Spirit
title: Pentecost

caption: Fresco of Assumption of Our Lady in the Vision of St Bonaventure in the church Chiesa di Santa Lucia del Gonfalone by Cesare Mariani (1863)
description: A fresco depicting Mary being assumed into heaven, as envisioned by St. Bonaventure.
location: Chiesa di Santa Lucia del Gonfalone
subject: The Assumption of Mary into heaven
title: Assumption of Our Lady in the Vision of St Bonaventure

caption: Coronation of the Virgin, fresco by Giuseppe Mattia Borgnis
description: A Baroque fresco depicting the Virgin Mary being crowned by the Holy Trinity, symbolizing her role as Queen of Heaven.
subject: Coronation of the Virgin Mary
title: Coronation of the Virgin

caption: Jan van Eyck's The Annunciation portrays the angel Gabriel announcing to Mary, who humbly accepts God's will
description: A Northern Renaissance masterpiece depicting the Angel Gabriel announcing Mary's divine motherhood, emphasizing light and symbolism.
location: National Gallery of Art, Washington, D.C.
subject: Annunciation to Mary
title: The Annunciation

caption: Basilica of the Visitation in Ein Karem, a village in the hill country of Judea where John the Baptist was born
description: A depiction of Mary's visit to Elizabeth, symbolizing joy, mutual recognition, and the Magnificat's themes.
location: Basilica of the Visitation, Ein Karem
subject: Mary visiting Elizabeth
title: The Visitation

caption: Nativity with St. Francis and St. Lawrence by Caravaggio
description: A Baroque Nativity scene emphasizing divine humility through chiaroscuro, with Saints Francis and Lawrence in adoration.
subject: Nativity of Jesus
title: Nativity with St. Francis and St. Lawrence

caption: Simeon's Song of Praise by Arent de Gelder
description: A Dutch Golden Age painting showing Simeon recognizing the infant Jesus as the Messiah during the Presentation.
subject: Presentation of Jesus at the Temple
title: Simeon's Song of Praise

caption: Finding of the Savior in the Temple by William Holman Hunt
description: A Pre-Raphaelite depiction of the 12-year-old Jesus discussing with scholars, emphasizing scriptural authority and youthful wisdom.
subject: Finding of Jesus in the Temple
title: The Finding of the Saviour in the Temple

caption: Apparition of the Messiah, an oil painting on canvas, measuring 540 cm × 750 cm, by Russian painter Alexander Andreyevich Ivanov (1806–1858)
description: A monumental Neoclassical work depicting John the Baptist revealing Jesus to the people, symbolizing messianic hope.
mystery_name: The Baptism of Jesus in the Jordan
subject: John the Baptist pointing to Christ
title: The Apparition of the Messiah

caption: Wedding at Cana by Paolo Veronese
description: A grand Renaissance depiction of Jesus turning water into wine, full of color, movement, and symbolic lavishness.
subject: Wedding at Cana miracle
title: The Wedding at Cana

caption: Christ in the Storm on the Sea of Galilee, a 1633 oil-on-canvas painting by the Dutch Golden Age painter Rembrandt van Rijn
description: A dramatic Dutch Golden Age work showing Christ's divine authority as he calms a storm-tossed sea.
location: Stolen, formerly Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum
mystery_name: The Proclamation of the Kingdom of God
original_title: Christus in de storm op het meer van Galilea
subject: Jesus calming the storm
title: The Storm on the Sea of Galilee

caption: The Savior’s Transfiguration by Theophanes the Greek
description: A Byzantine-style fresco showing Christ's divine glory revealed to Peter, James, and John on Mount Tabor.
subject: Transfiguration of Jesus
title: The Transfiguration

caption: Christ and the Disciples Before the Last Supper by Henry Ossawa Tanner
description: A tender moment as Christ speaks with his disciples before the Last Supper, rendered in muted tones and expressive realism.
subject: Christ and disciples preparing for the Last Supper
title: Christ and the Disciples Before the Last Supper

caption: The Arrest of Christ Kiss of Judas by Giotto
description: Judas identifies Christ to the soldiers with a kiss, capturing tension and betrayal in Giotto's emotive fresco.
subject: Judas betraying Christ with a kiss
title: The Arrest of Christ (Kiss of Judas)

caption: The Flagellation of Our Lord Jesus Christ by Bouguereau
description: A harrowing depiction of Christ bound and scourged, emphasizing suffering through Bouguereau's meticulous technique.
subject: Christ being scourged
title: The Flagellation of Our Lord Jesus Christ

caption: Van Dyck's _The Crowning with Thorns_ (early 17th century), a Baroque depiction of Christ's suffering and paradoxical triumph
description: A dramatic Baroque portrayal of Christ's humiliation, with soldiers pressing the thorny crown onto his head.
subject: Christ mocked with a crown of thorns
title: The Crowning with Thorns

caption: Raphael's Christ Falls on the Way to Calvary, a painting depicting Christ stumbling under the cross with Mary and a crowd witnessing
description: Christ collapses under the weight of the cross, with Mary and Simon of Cyrene reaching out to help.
subject: Christ stumbling under the cross
title: Christ Falls on the Way to Calvary

caption: The Descent from the Cross (1616-1617) by Rubens: A dynamic, dramatic depiction of Christ's descent
description: Rubens' visceral portrayal of grief as Christ's lifeless body is tenderly lowered by Mary and disciples.
location: Cathedral of Our Lady, Antwerp, Belgium
subject: Lowering Christ's body from the cross
title: The Descent from the Cross

caption: The Three Marys at the Tomb by Annibale Carracci, 17th century at Hermitage Museum, reveals Baroque vividness and drama
description: Baroque drama unfolds as the women discover Christ's resurrection, their gestures conveying awe and joy.
subject: Mary Magdalene and companions at Christ's empty tomb
title: The Three Marys at the Tomb

caption: Christ Taking Leave of the Apostles by Duccio, 14th century, Museo dell'Opera, tempera on wood, Gothic details
description: A Gothic panel showing Christ blessing his disciples, with delicate gold detailing and solemn composition.
location: Museo dell'Opera del Duomo, Siena, Italy
subject: Christ's farewell to his apostles before Ascension
title: Christ Taking Leave of the Apostles

caption: Simone Peterzano's Pentecost depicts the Virgin and disciples receiving the Holy Spirit in Mannerist style
description: Flames hover over the gathered figures as the Holy Spirit descends, rendered with Mannerist dynamism.
mystery_name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
subject: Descent of the Holy Spirit upon Mary and apostles
title: Pentecost

caption: The Divine Exchange Between Mother and Son
description: A radiant stained glass window showing Mary's Assumption into heaven, surrounded by angels and divine light.
subject: Mary ascending to heaven
title: The Assumption of Mary

caption: Mary, Help of Christians by Giuseppe Rollini
description: A fresco depicting the Virgin Mary as the Help of Christians, emphasizing her intercessory role in the Catholic tradition.
subject: Virgin Mary
title: Mary, Help of Christians
